contents.text: Welcome to DesignMap in San Francisco, where we leverage years of industry experience to deliver smart user experience design that makes enterprise software great.
For user experience design services, press 1.
If you’re interested in starting a new design project, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a UX design specialist.

navigationGoals: Kick off a new UX design engagement with a specialist
I want to start a new UX design project to build an app for veterans.
Kick off a new UX design project and align on user flows, wireframes, and high-fidelity prototypes for our enterprise portal.
I’m ready to start a new user experience design project for my application.
I need to start a new UI design for a physics experiment data visualization app.

contents.text: For support on an existing design engagement, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with your project lead.

navigationGoals: Get support for my ongoing design project
I need support refining the current UX for our veteran support platform.
Get support on our existing design engagement: refine the component library and update the UI style guide based on stakeholder feedback.
I need help with the ongoing design engagement we already have.
I’d like to request tweaks to the existing UI designs for my lab data analysis tool.

contents.text: For enterprise software development solutions, press 2.
For technical architecture and integration inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our development architect.

navigationGoals: Discuss technical architecture and integration for our enterprise software
I’d like to discuss technical architecture for integrating our veteran services data.
Discuss technical architecture and integration: advise on microservices design, API gateway setup, and data synchronization patterns.
I have questions about technical architecture and integrating our systems.
I have questions about integrating my simulation software with the university’s data servers.

contents.text: For project status updates or ongoing support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our support team.

navigationGoals: Obtain a progress update and support for my software development project
I’m calling to get a status update on our enterprise software and arrange ongoing support.
Request a project status update for our development initiative: check sprint progress, issue backlog, and deployment timeline.
I need a support update on our existing enterprise software solution.
I want a status update and ongoing support for the lab equipment control system you’re developing.
